posts.text:
Abit aa8xe það er frá 2004 er til í skifti á aflgjafa eða skjákorti eða bara cash !   
max ram 8gb 4x2
socket  intel 775
1 x PCI-E X16 slot
2 x PCI-E X1 slots
2 x PCI slots
1 x BP-Audio port
1 x Floppy port
1 x UDMA 100/66/33 connector
4 x SATA 150 connectors
2 x USB 2.0 headers
2 x IEEE1394 headers
ABIT Dual OTES™
1 x PS/2 keyboard, 1 x PS/2 mouse
1 x IEEE1394
4 x USB 2.0,
1 x RJ-45 LAN (Gigabit), 1 x RJ-45 LAN (10/100)
1 x BP-Audio (S/P DIF in/out, Line Out, Line-in, MIC-in, Center/Subwoofer, Rear Surround, Surround Speaker)
